content: Best believe there are folks out there that see the publicity surrounding Bigfoot erotica as an opening to wider acceptance for their interest in the Lochness Monster’s monster cock
I remember discovering Dinosaur erotica on amazon and wondering why I’m not capitalizing on that shit
iirc you already have the costume for it, so the initial investment has already been made...
No reason you can’t multitask lmaoooo
lmao @ all the people who think those shadowy pics were of Nessie's nick and head
Nessie schlong spottings are the stuff of legends
Um, isn't the Loch Ness monster female?
Enjoy your trip, but don’t get sprung on Nessie cuz she can’t travel back with you lol
Joplin Spook Light erotica or go the fuck home imo
